data.message: Boohoo. Eminem's 1st music video mocked Bill Clinton, He had a few verses about Bush and mocked Dick Cheney's heart attack but now he said something bad about my cult leader Donald Trump so he should stay out of politics! He grew up around black people with black friends in an all black music group but I want him to be a racist because he is white like my cult leader Donald Trump waaaaaahhh 😭
